thread.section_title: Balmoral Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent, personal front-of-house service.
thread.title_full: Excellent, personal front-of-house service. - Review of Balmoral Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: trevor494
title: Excellent, personal front-of-house service.
text:
The room (47) was immaculately presented with all the facilities of a modern hotel. For a city centre hotel in such a prime spot the size of the room was acceptable and well-equipped with storage space. Breakfast is provided on site and room-service meals are ordered in from a nearby restaurant one hour after the order is made. There is a small bar in the lounge but no on-site restaurant facilities after breakfast. The Etoile Metro station is within 100 metres (red and green lines). The Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysees are very close by with a great many restaurants in the immediate vicinity.
Room Tip: Inward facing rooms onto internal courtyard (e.g. 47) are almost silent. See more room tips
